name: Messy Neighbours
description:
Wow your neighbours are messy!

You have to clean the neighbourhood all by yourself!

Are they on vacation? Who cares, drive over the trash cans so the neighbourhood will be clean again!

Controls:

  • W - Moving Forward
  • A&D - Steering Car
  • S - Moving Backwards
  • Space - Braking
  • R - Unflip your vehicle

This Game was made for the LowEffortJam20 (https://itch.io/jam/low-effort-jam-20)

The Game was made using Unity and C#.

The World is Randomly Generated. Use the same seed as your friend to race for the fastest time!

Choose between 3 different World Sizes: Tiny, Normal or Huge

Playing in fullscreen is highly recommended!

Thanks for checking my game out :)
